data.message: So I don't want to download messenger ....now I can't send messages so what now? I was going to ask in a message but can't send them or receive them so I want to be able to do that again or I guess I'll just have to delete my Facebook

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Dale. We're constantly working on the Messenger experience. We hope you'll give it a try and tell us what you think: http://on.fb.me/1uGBwMk -Hailey
Messenger is dangerous people can hack it and do a hole bunch I got told this by the police when I kept getting messages on it from someone knowing everything Bout my kids!

We hear your frustration, Chantal and understand your concerns. We've provided more information about the permissions Messenger requests and how we actually use them here: https://www.facebook.com/messengerfacts  -Chantal

Messenger has no more applications  then most other apps. It is a bunch of misinformation.  That said if you go to the mobile  version  of Facebook  as in type in a browser  u can use the message  service without  messenger.
